turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please get me a grande Mocha from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you mean the one at Domain or Great Hills?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The closet one to you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Fat free milk or full milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have soymilk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am sorry that option is out.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am so sorry, that is not available either

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, fat free is good then

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about the syrup? Full pump or half?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess two pumps will be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Is there anything else you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a blueberry muffin please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am sorry they are completely out today. Is there anything else you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about Oatmeal cookie?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, how many would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome!
